name: Sorcerer's Cavern
description:
Legends tell of an ancient emerald worth a fortune hidden deep underground... 
You are tasked with finding this gem by venturing through the 4 layers of a cave called "The Sorcerer's Cavern".

Use W, A, S, and D or the Arrow Keys to move.
You can also look around with the mouse.
Grab the hidden key and unlock the exit ladder on each layer.

When in combat, use a random list of spells to attack your enemies. But most importantly, use the Power (red) and Defense (blue) Orbs to your benefit.
Clicking either Orb will result in your Attack or Defense increasing dramatically for 15 seconds. After this boost, you must kill 4 enemies to recharge it.

The orbs are Stronger Together. If you activate both simultaneously, you will gain Godlike Power, but with the cost of a much greater recharge cost...

Good Luck!

Once the Jam ends I'll upload a web version to make the game easier to play (I didn't have enough time to build a web version since I submitted this at 2 am, I was way too tired).
